item.title: Jill add a quote by Babe Ruth
item.description: "Every strike brings me closer to the next home run." -- Babe Ruth

item.title: Jill add a quote by Charles Jones
item.description: "Things don't go wrong and break your heart so you can become bitter and give up. They happen to break you down and build you up so you can be all that you were intended to be." -- Charles Jones

item.title: Jill add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "Never give in. Never give in. Never, never, never, never—in nothing, great or small, large or petty—never give in, except to convictions of honour and good sense. Never yield to force. Never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Jill add a quote by Mary Anne Radmacher
item.description: "Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I'll try again tomorrow." -- Mary Anne Radmacher

item.title: Jill add a quote by Ovid
item.description: "Dripping water hollows out stone, not through force but through persistence." -- Ovid

item.title: Jill add a quote by Goldie Hawn
item.description: "The lotus is the most beautiful flower, whose petals open one by one. But it will only grow in the mud. In order to grow and gain wisdom, first you must have the mud --- the obstacles of life and its suffering. ... The mud speaks of the common ground that humans share, no matter what our stations in life. ... Whether we have it all or we have nothing, we are all faced with the same obstacles: sadness, loss, illness, dying and death. If we are to strive as human beings to gain more wisdom, more kindness and more compassion, we must have the intention to grow as a lotus and open each petal one by one. " -- Goldie Hawn

item.title: Jill add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Life, Stormy says, is not about how fast you run or even with what degree of grace. It's about perseverance, about staying on your feet and slogging forward no matter what." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Jill add a quote by Madeleine Albright
item.description: "I was taught to strive not because there were any guarantees of success but because the act of striving is in itself the only way to keep faith with life." -- Madeleine Albright

item.title: Jill add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill me, makes me stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Jill add a quote by Charles de Gaulle
item.description: "A man of character finds a special attractiveness in difficulty, since it is only by coming to grips with difficulty that he can realize his potentialities." -- Charles de Gaulle

item.title: Jill add a quote by Oliver Goldsmith
item.description: "Our greatest glory consists not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." -- Oliver Goldsmith

item.title: Jill add a quote by Tom Hiddleston
item.description: "You never know what's around the corner. It could be everything. Or it could be nothing. You keep putting one foot in front of the other, and then one day you look back and you've climbed a mountain." -- Tom Hiddleston

item.title: Jill add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Sure I am this day we are masters of our fate, that the task which has been set before us is not above our strength; that its pangs and toils are not beyond our endurance. As long as we have faith in our own cause and an unconquerable will to win, victory will not be denied us." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Jill add a quote by Billie Jean King
item.description: "Champions keep playing until they get it right." -- Billie Jean King

item.title: Jill add a quote by Liza Wiemer
item.description: "Perseverance is the act of true role models and heroes." -- Liza Wiemer
